summary: Analyzed LaTeX setup (VimTeX, texlab, LuaSnip snippets, nvim-surround bindings) and identified Typst equivalents (tinymist LSP, typst-preview.nvim, typst.vim). Key finding: tinymist not installed - needs NixOS package. Recommends <leader>t prefix for Typst bindings parallel to <leader>l for LaTeX.

artifacts.summary: Comprehensive research report with 4-phase implementation plan covering NixOS packages, plugin configuration, ftplugin bindings, and snippets
